post.body: seriously. maybe they should take "tech" out of their name
how can you say twitter isnt ready for prime time cuz its hacked? that's like saying planes aren't ready because they've crashed
iTunes doesn't support playback of flac. Try www.getsongbird.com
HAHAHAHAHAHA i'm sure he'd love that.
i know. but persuading my aunt and uncle to replace with a mac is like... tough!
seriously. it's like i'm caught in a web of registry keys and lies! hahaha
i love my v-modas. but the apple's are worth $80. little too much treble, but vmoda are too bassy. overall a good decision.
css overflow/wrapping problem!!!! at least it doesn't do what twitter did with that... haha
every time i read techcrunch, i see more closed minded idiocy being posted. think before you type.
Sitting in apple store. What's something I can do to screw up an imac? Non destructive and fun!!!
OH @jasonredmond to @ikollin - "you're so hipster it kills me." @ikollin is wearing jeans and a white v-neck tshirt.
Wedding I'm at is late starting. Pretty church though!
so glad that i just killed my finder and can't get it back up and running. restart on the way...
doing virus removal from my uncle's computer. not working. pissed.
ok, who's going to Reel Big Fish Jan 5th marquee theatre tempe, az? I'll be there!!!
